name: AIR Battlefront
description:
Immerse yourself in epic air battles with hundreds of enemies.

AIR Battlefront is arcade fly combat shooter game based on WW2 theme. You play as a pilot of an aircraft of your country. The main objective - destroy as many enemy planes as possible.Features:
  • Both First-person and Third-person view
  • Fast paced mid-air battles
  • Realistic control of an aircraft
  • Full controller support
  • Global leaderboard
